tooltip.last_approved_text: Fixed position artillery units that pack quite a punch, they are nevertheless very weak if engaged in melee.

unit_class.tooltip: Fixed position artillery units that pack quite a punch, they are nevertheless very weak if engaged in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: With a long range and able to cause great damage, field artillery can be moved slowly around the battlefield, but are very weak if engaged in melee.

unit_class.tooltip: With a long range and able to cause great damage, field artillery can be moved slowly around the battlefield, but are very weak if engaged in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Huge siege engines perfect for knocking down walls and gatehouses.

unit_class.tooltip: Huge siege engines perfect for knocking down walls and gatehouses.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Although they are versatile units protected by shields, melee cavalry are weak against more specialised units.

unit_class.tooltip: Although they are versatile units protected by shields, melee cavalry are weak against more specialised units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast moving and with a long range, missile cavalry are great at harassing their enemies, but weak if pinned down in melee.

unit_class.tooltip: Fast moving and with a long range, missile cavalry are great at harassing their enemies, but weak if pinned down in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The hammer to the infantry of any army, they are devastating when charged into the flank or rear of enemies.

unit_class.tooltip: The hammer to the infantry of any army, they are devastating when charged into the flank or rear of enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast moving units with a wide turning circle, they can punch through weak enemy units. They are vulnerable if pinned down in combat.

unit_class.tooltip: Fast moving units with a wide turning circle, they can punch through weak enemy units. They are vulnerable if pinned down in combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These are small units that protect the general whilst he gets on with his job.

unit_class.tooltip: These are small units that protect the general whilst he gets on with his job.

tooltip.last_approved_text: There's nothing quite like an elephant to make a hole in an enemy line. Flaming projectiles and javelins are the best way to counter them.

unit_class.tooltip: There's nothing quite like an elephant to make a hole in an enemy line. Flaming projectiles and javelins are the best way to counter them.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.

unit_class.tooltip: Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Long range units who provide support for melee units, but are themselves generally weak in close combat.

unit_class.tooltip: Long range units who provide support for melee units, but are themselves generally weak in close combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Long pikes make these troops deadly from the front but vulnerable if flanked. They are highly effective against cavalry.

unit_class.tooltip: Long pikes make these troops deadly from the front but vulnerable if flanked. They are highly effective against cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Solid defensive infantry protected by shields, they are very good when ranged against cavalry.

unit_class.tooltip: Solid defensive infantry protected by shields, they are very good when ranged against cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These ships can do a lot of damage from long range, but can be neutralised by boarding and ramming.

unit_class.tooltip: These ships can do a lot of damage from long range, but can be neutralised by boarding and ramming.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Perfect for taking out enemy ships, but have to close quickly and board to be successful.

unit_class.tooltip: Perfect for taking out enemy ships, but have to close quickly and board to be successful.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Enemy ships can be showered with their projectiles, but they must steer clear of enemy melee ships.

unit_class.tooltip: Enemy ships can be showered with their projectiles, but they must steer clear of enemy melee ships.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Slow but with plenty of space, they do their job well. Just remember that they aren't warships.

unit_class.tooltip: Slow but with plenty of space, they do their job well. Just remember that they aren't warships.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Nothing says "surprise!" like unleashing animals on the battlefield.

unit_class.tooltip: Nothing says "surprise!" like unleashing animals on the battlefield.
